title: pazhamudir shOlai vElan
sahitya:
pazhamudir shOlai vElan kazhalaDi tozhu manamE


anupallavi

  ezhil mighu vaDivOu iNaiyilAp-pugazhODu kuzhaindurugum uLLam koNDuLLa vaLLal


caraNam    azhiyAdu perugiDum avan arum perumaiyai anudinam inimEl ninandu pOTrinAl 
ozhiyAdu OngiDum Uzhvinait-tollaigaL Oindu viraivinil tEindu maraindiDum
